Pepper__bell___Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial spot affects pepper leaves causing dark, water-soaked lesions that turn brown.

prevention: Water at the base of the plant.

Potato___Early_blight.description: Fungal disease causing brown concentric circles on leaves.
prevention: Apply mulch to reduce soil splash.

Potato___Late_blight.description: Severe fungal disease causing dark spots and white mold on leaves.

Tomato_Target_Spot.description: Fungal disease causing circular target-like spots on tomato leaves and stems.

Tomato_Tomato_mosaic_virus.description: Viral disease causing mosaic patterns, leaf distortion, and stunted plants.
treatment: No chemical cure. Remove infected plants immediately.
prevention: Avoid tobacco handling before touching plants.

Tomato_Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.description: Virus transmitted by whiteflies causing yellowing, curling leaves, and stunted growth.
treatment: Control whiteflies using neem oil or insecticidal soap.
prevention: Avoid planting near old infected plants.

Tomato_Bacterial_spot.description: Bacterial disease causing dark spots on leaves and fruit.

Tomato_Early_blight.description: Fungal disease causing brown rings on lower leaves.

description: Fungal disease causing brown rings on lower leaves
prevention: Avoid planting tomatoes during high humidity.

Tomato_Leaf_Mold.description: Fungal disease forming yellow patches on upper leaf and velvety mold underneath.

Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot.description: Fungal disease causing small circular spots with dark borders.
prevention: Use mulch to prevent soil splash.

Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m.description: Tiny pests that suck plant juices causing yellowing and webbing on leaves.
treatment: Wash leaves with strong water spray to remove mites.
